com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors

Class DetailFormViewProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.EntityViewProcessorAdapter
      • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.DetailFormViewProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityViewProcessor

    @Component
 @Exposed
public class DetailFormViewProcessor
extends EntityViewProcessorAdapter
    Provides a default modify and back button for a EntityView.DETAIL_VIEW_NAME view. The modify button will redirect to the EntityView.UPDATE_VIEW_NAME view of the entity and the back button will return to the entity overview page, unless a specific from request attribute is present.
    Since:
    3.2.0
    Author:
    Steven Gentens
